# Ghoul Gesture (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]]

**Level: [[Hunger (Domain)|Hunger 3]]**

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Effect:** Ray

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude partial

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 104

*A green ray stabs from your pointing finger to strike the belly of your enemy.*

You must succeed on a ranged touch attack with the ray to strike a target. A subject that is successfully targeted must make a Fortitude save or be [[Paralyzed|paralyzed]] for the duration of the spell.

A subject of the ray that succeeds on its Fortitude save is instead [[Sickened|sickened]] for the duration of the spell. *[[Neutralize Poison (Spell)|Neutralize poison]]* removes the [[Sickened|sickened]] condition.

*Material Component:* A small scrap of cloth taken from clothing worn by a ghoul, or a pinch of earth from a ghoulâ€™s lair.
